title: Spider-Man: Home Sweet Home
description: A movie about a spider that becomes a superhero after being bitten by a nerdy high school student.

title: One Piece
description: A young girl named Monkey D. Luffy embarks on a journey to become the next Pirate Queen.

title: Breaking Good
description: A story about a struggling chemistry teacher who decides to use his skills for a more wholesome purpose: making bread.
